Summary: TRIANGLE SHAPED, 3 LIGHTS LIKE BELGUM UFO OF THE LATE 80S
trends: There have been no other sightings in Mt Kisco
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting DetailsAS I WAS DRIVING NORTH ON THE SAW MILL PARKWAY ABOUT 11:45 PM TO 12:00 AM. I NOTICED A TRIANGULAR SHAPED CRAFT IN THE SKY OVER THE TOWN OF MOUNT KISCO IN WESTCHESTER NEW YORK. AT FIRST I THOUGHT IT WAS A PLANE FROM NEAR BY WESTCHESTER AIRPORT, BUT I NOTICED THE CRAFT WAS STATIONARY AND NOT MOVING AND I WAS DRIVING MORE NORTH ON THE PARK WAY I GOT A BETTER LOOK AT THE OBJECT AND THEN I COULD SEE NO FORM OF WINGS OR BLINKING LIGHTS TO JUSTIFY THE OBJECT AS AN AIRPLANE. AS I GOT OFF THE PARKWAY AND ONTO ROUTE 117 NORTH, I LOST VIEW OF THE OBJECT AND DID NOT SEE IT AGAIN.
